00882             inline Group* Group::create(Model* model,size_t capacity)
00883             {
00884                         Group* obj = new Group(model,capacity);
00885                         registerObject(obj);
00886                         return obj;
00887             }

00914             inline void Group::enableSorting(bool sort)
00915             {

00917                         distanceComputationEnabled = sort;
00918             }

00920             inline void Group::enableDistanceComputation(bool distanceComputation)
00921             {
00922                         distanceComputationEnabled = distanceComputation;
00923                         if (!distanceComputation) enableSorting(false);
00924             }
